name: clustering
description: Conversation block used to decide the type of clustering algorithm and its hyperparameters

parameters.question: What clustering algorithm do you want to use? You can choose between kmeans, dbscan and agglomerative
parameters.help: Kmeans is usually useful when you expect your groups to have very similar features overall, while dbscan and agglomerative are more effective linking together elements that have some similar features but also very different ones
